titles: The beauty of holiness, or, A description of the excellency, amiablenes, comfort, and content which is to be found in wayes of purity and holinesse where you have that glorious attribute of Gods holinesse exactly setforth : together with the absolute necessity of our resembling him therein ... / by Tho. Hall.
author: Hall, Thomas, 1610-1665.
publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler for John Browne,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
